mapper.insert: insert into board (ctg_no, user_no, board_title, board_content, board_nick, board_ip) values (#{ctg_no}, #{user_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, (select user_nick from user where user_no = #{user_no}), #{board_ip});
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_like l WHERE l.board_no = b.board_no) AS like_count FROM board b LEFT JOIN board_like l ON b.board_no = l.board_no WHERE b.ctg_no = #{ctg_no}
mapper.update: update board set board_hit = board_hit + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.insert: insert into board_reply (board_no, user_no, reply_content, reply_nick, reply_ip) values (#{board_no}, #{user_no}, #{reply_content}, (select user_nick from user where user_no = #{user_no}), #{reply_ip});
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_reply where board_no=#{board_no}
select * from board_reply where board_no = #{board_no} order by reply_no DESC
select count(*) from board_like where board_no = #{board_no}
select count(*) from board_like where board_no = #{board_no} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.delete: delete from board_like where board_no = #{board_no} and user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: SELECT i.file_name FROM board br JOIN user_file uf ON br.user_no = uf.user_no JOIN img_file i ON uf.file_no = i.file_no WHERE br.board_no = #{board_no}
